trans-unit.source: Provides a wrapper for parsing and building paths to WMI objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供剖析和建立對 WMI 物件路徑的包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref> class that is empty.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref>是空的類別。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref> class for the given path.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref>給定路徑的類別。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object path.
trans-unit.target: 物件路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class portion of the path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定路徑的類別部分。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value A string containing the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值，包含的類別名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value that holds the class portion of the path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>值，其中保存類別部分的路徑。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回一份<xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default scope path used when no scope is specified.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定未指定範圍時使用的預設領域路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default scope is \\\\.\root\cimv2, and can be changed by setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 預設範圍是\\ \\.\root\cimv2，而且可以變更此屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"></xref> that contains the default scope (namespace) path used when no scope is specified.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Management.ManagementPath"> </xref> ，其中包含未指定範圍時使用的預設範圍 （命名空間） 路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a class path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為類別路徑。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value `true` if this is a class path; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值`true`如果這是類別的路徑; 否則`false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether this is a class path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出這是否為類別的路徑。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is an instance path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為執行個體路徑。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value `true` if this is an instance path; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值`true`如果這是執行個體路徑; 否則`false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether this is an instance path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出這是否為執行個體路徑。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a *singleton* instance path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為*單一*執行個體路徑。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value `true` if this is a singleton instance path; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值`true`如果這是單一執行個體路徑; 否則`false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether this is a singleton instance path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出這是否為單一執行個體路徑。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace part of the path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定命名空間路徑的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that this does not include the server name, which can be retrieved separately.
trans-unit.target: 請注意這不包括伺服器名稱，它可以單獨擷取。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value A string containing the namespace portion of the path represented in this object.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值字串，包含的命名空間一部分，表示此物件中的路徑。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the namespace part of the path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>值，包含命名空間的一部分的路徑。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string representation of the full path in the object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件的完整路徑的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value A string containing the full path represented in this object.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值，包含在此物件表示的完整路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the full path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>值，包含完整路徑。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative path: class name and keys only.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相對路徑︰ 類別名稱和只有索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value A string containing the relative path (not including the server and namespace portions) represented in this object.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值字串，包含表示此物件中的相對路徑 （不包括伺服器和命名空間部分）。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the relative path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>值，包含相對路徑。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the server part of the path.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定伺服器的部分路徑。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value A string containing the server name from the path represented in this object.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值，包含伺服器名稱，表示此物件中之路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the server name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>值，其中包含伺服器名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Sets the path as a new class path.
trans-unit.target: 為新的類別路徑設定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This means that the path must have a class name but not key values.
trans-unit.target: 這表示路徑必須有類別名稱，但不是索引鍵值。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the path as a new *singleton* object path.
trans-unit.target: 將路徑設定為新*單一*物件路徑。

trans-unit.source: This means that it is a path to an instance but there are no key values.
trans-unit.target: 這表示它是執行個體路徑，但沒有任何索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的物件目前的執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的物件，為這個執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full object path as the string representation.
trans-unit.target: 傳回完整的物件路徑做為字串表示。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the full object path represented by this object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含這個物件所表示的完整物件路徑。

trans-unit.source: This value is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath.Path*> property.
trans-unit.target: 此值相當於值<xref:System.Management.ManagementPath.Path*>屬性。</xref:System.Management.ManagementPath.Path*>
